mean_cn: n. 热带，回归线；  adj. 热带的
mean_en: one of the two imaginary lines drawn around the world 23° 26′ north (the Tropic of Cancer) or south (the Tropic of Capricorn) of the equator
sentence: The tropics are the hottest part of the world.
sentence_trans: 热带地区是全球最热的地方。
word_etyma: trop转 + ic表名词 → 太阳回转的地方 → tropic回归线
